4409  targets = torch.randint(1, 15, (sum(target_lengths),), dtype=torch.int)
4410  log_probs = torch.randn(50, 3, 15, dtype=torch.float, device='cuda').log_softmax(2)
4411  res = torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets, input_lengths, target_lengths)
4412  expected = ctcloss_reference(log_probs, targets.cuda(), input_lengths, target_lengths).float()
4413  with torch.backends.cudnn.flags(enabled=False):
4414  res2 = torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets.cuda().long(), input_lengths, target_lengths)
4415  self.assertEqual(res, expected)
4416  self.assertEqual(res2, res)
4417 
4418  def test_CTCLoss_typechecks(self):
4419  target_lengths = torch.tensor([30, 25, 20])
4420  input_lengths = torch.tensor([50, 50, 50])
4421  targets = torch.randint(1, 15, (sum(target_lengths),), dtype=torch.int)
4422  log_probs = torch.randn(50, 3, 15, dtype=torch.float).log_softmax(2)
4423  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
4424  _input_lengths = input_lengths.to(dtype=torch.float)
4425  torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets, _input_lengths, target_lengths)
4426  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
4427  target_lengths = target_lengths.to(dtype=torch.float)
4428  torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets, input_lengths, target_lengths)
4429 
4430  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
4431  def test_CTCLoss_lengthchecks_cuda(self):
4432  target_lengths = [30, 25, 20]
4433  input_lengths = [50, 50, 50]
4434  targets = torch.randint(1, 15, (3, 29), dtype=torch.long, device='cuda')
4435  log_probs = torch.randn(50, 3, 15, dtype=torch.float, device='cuda').log_softmax(2)
4436  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
4437  torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets, input_lengths, target_lengths)
4438 
4439  def test_CTCLoss_lengthchecks_cpu(self):
4440  target_lengths = [30, 25, 20]
4441  input_lengths = [50, 50, 50]
4442  targets = torch.randint(1, 15, (3, 29), dtype=torch.int)
4443  log_probs = torch.randn(50, 3, 15, dtype=torch.float).log_softmax(2)
4444  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
4445  torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets, input_lengths, target_lengths)
4446 
4447  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
4448  def test_CTCLoss_zero_infinity(self):
4449  target_lengths = [60, 25, 20]
4450  input_lengths = [50, 50, 50]
4451  targets = torch.randint(1, 15, (sum(target_lengths),), dtype=torch.int)
4452  log_probs = torch.randn(50, 3, 15, dtype=torch.float, device='cuda').log_softmax(2).requires_grad_()
4453  res = torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets, input_lengths, target_lengths,
4454  reduction='sum', zero_infinity=True)
4455  with torch.backends.cudnn.flags(enabled=False):
4456  res2 = torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs, targets.cuda().long(), input_lengths, target_lengths,
4457  reduction='sum', zero_infinity=True)
4458  res_cpu = torch.nn.functional.ctc_loss(log_probs.cpu(), targets.cpu(), input_lengths, target_lengths,
4459  reduction='sum', zero_infinity=True)
4460 
4461  self.assertAlmostEqual(res2, res, delta=1e-4)
4462  self.assertAlmostEqual(res_cpu, res.cpu(), delta=1e-4)
4463  g1, = torch.autograd.grad(res, log_probs)
4464  g2, = torch.autograd.grad(res2, log_probs)
4465  g3, = torch.autograd.grad(res_cpu, log_probs)
4466  self.assertAlmostEqual(g2, g3, delta=1e-4)
4467  self.assertAlmostEqual(g1, g2, delta=1e-4)
4468  self.assertTrue((g1 == g1).all().item()) # check that we don't have NaN
4469 
4470  def test_RNN_cell_no_broadcasting(self):
4471  def test(cell_module, input, hx, input_size, hidden_size):
4472  cell = cell_module(input_size, hidden_size)
4473  self.assertRaises(RuntimeError, lambda: cell(input, hx))
4474 
4475  def test_all(hidden_size, bad_hx, good_hx, input_size, input):
4476  test(nn.RNNCell, input, bad_hx, input_size, hidden_size)
4477  test(nn.GRUCell, input, bad_hx, input_size, hidden_size)
4478  test(nn.LSTMCell, input, (bad_hx, good_hx), input_size, hidden_size)
4479  test(nn.LSTMCell, input, (good_hx, bad_hx), input_size, hidden_size)
4480 
4481  hidden_size = 20
4482  input_size = 10
4483  input = torch.randn(3, input_size)
4484  bad_hx = torch.randn(1, hidden_size)
4485  good_hx = torch.randn(3, hidden_size)
4486 
4487  # Test hidden/input batch size broadcasting
4488  test_all(hidden_size, bad_hx, good_hx, input_size, input)
4489 
4490  # Test hx's hidden_size vs module's hidden_size broadcasting
4491  bad_hx = torch.randn(3, 1)
4492  test_all(hidden_size, bad_hx, good_hx, input_size, input)
4493 
4494  # Test input's input_size vs module's input_size broadcasting
4495  bad_input = torch.randn(3, 1)
4496  test_all(hidden_size, good_hx, good_hx, input_size, bad_input)
4497 
4498  def test_invalid_dropout_p(self):
4499  v = torch.ones(1)
4500  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: nn.Dropout(-0.1))
4501  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: nn.Dropout(1.1))
4502  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: nn.Dropout2d(-0.1))
4503  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: nn.Dropout2d(1.1))
4504  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: nn.Dropout3d(-0.1))
4505  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: nn.Dropout3d(1.1))
4506  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: F.dropout(v, -0.1))
4507  self.assertRaises(ValueError, lambda: F.dropout(v, 1.1))
4508 
4509  def test_pad_sequence(self):
4510  def pad(tensor, length):
4511  return torch.cat(
4512  [tensor.data, tensor.data.new(
4513  length - tensor.size(0), *tensor.size()[1:]).zero_()])
4514 
4515  # single dimensional
4516  a = torch.tensor([1, 2, 3])
4517  b = torch.tensor([4, 5])
4518  c = torch.tensor([6])
4519 
4520  # batch_first = true
4521  expected = torch.tensor([[4, 5, 0], [1, 2, 3], [6, 0, 0]])
4522  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence([b, a, c], True)
4523  self.assertEqual(padded, expected)
4524 
4525  # batch_first = false
4526  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence([b, a, c])
4527  self.assertEqual(padded, expected.transpose(0, 1))
4528 
4529  # pad with non-zero value
4530  expected = torch.tensor([[4, 5, 1], [1, 2, 3], [6, 1, 1]])
4531  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence([b, a, c], True, 1)
4532  self.assertEqual(padded, expected)
4533 
4534  # Test pad sorted sequence
4535  expected = torch.tensor([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 0], [6, 0, 0]])
4536  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence([a, b, c], True)
4537  self.assertEqual(padded, expected)
4538 
4539  # more dimensions
4540  maxlen = 9
4541  for num_dim in (0, 1, 2, 3):
4542  sequences = []
4543  trailing_dims = [4] * num_dim
4544  for i in range(1, maxlen + 1):
4545  seq_len = i * i
4546  sequences.append(torch.rand(seq_len, 5, *trailing_dims))
4547  random.shuffle(sequences)
4548  expected = []
4549  for seq in sequences:
4550  expected.append(pad(seq, maxlen * maxlen))
4551  # batch first = true
4552  expected = torch.stack(expected)
4553  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence(sequences, True)
4554  self.assertEqual(padded, expected)
4555 
4556  # batch first = false
4557  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence(sequences)
4558  self.assertEqual(padded, expected.transpose(0, 1))
4559 
4560  def test_pack_sequence(self):
4561  def _compatibility_test(sequences, lengths, batch_first, enforce_sorted=False):
4562  padded = rnn_utils.pad_sequence(sequences, batch_first)
4563  packed = rnn_utils.pack_sequence(sequences, enforce_sorted)
4564  unpacked = rnn_utils.pad_packed_sequence(packed, batch_first)
4565  self.assertEqual(padded, unpacked[0])
4566  pack_padded = rnn_utils.pack_padded_sequence(
4567  padded, lengths, batch_first, enforce_sorted)
4568  self.assertEqual(packed, pack_padded)
4569 
4570  # single dimensional
4571  a = torch.tensor([1, 2, 3])
4572  b = torch.tensor([4, 5])
4573  c = torch.tensor([6])
4574  packed = rnn_utils.pack_sequence([a, b, c], enforce_sorted=False)
4575  expected = torch.tensor([1, 4, 6, 2, 5, 3])
4576  self.assertEqual(packed.batch_sizes, [3, 2, 1])
4577  self.assertEqual(packed.data.data, expected)
4578  self.assertEqual(packed.sorted_indices, [0, 1, 2])
4579  self.assertEqual(packed.unsorted_indices, [0, 1, 2])
4580 
4581  packed_unsorted = rnn_utils.pack_sequence([b, c, a], enforce_sorted=False)
4582  self.assertEqual(packed_unsorted.batch_sizes, [3, 2, 1])
4583  self.assertEqual(packed_unsorted.data.data, expected)
4584  self.assertEqual(packed_unsorted.sorted_indices, [2, 0, 1])
4585  self.assertEqual(packed_unsorted.unsorted_indices, [1, 2, 0])
4586 
4587  # single dimensional, enforce_sorted = True
4588  packed_enforce_sorted = rnn_utils.pack_sequence([a, b, c], enforce_sorted=True)
4589  self.assertEqual(packed_enforce_sorted.batch_sizes, [3, 2, 1])
4590  self.assertEqual(packed_enforce_sorted.data.data, expected)
4591  self.assertTrue(packed_enforce_sorted.sorted_indices is None)
4592  self.assertTrue(packed_enforce_sorted.unsorted_indices is None)
4593 
4594  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, 'must be sorted in decreasing order'):
4595  rnn_utils.pack_sequence([b, c, a], enforce_sorted=True)
4596 
4597  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, 'You can pass `enforce_sorted=False`'):
4598  rnn_utils.pack_sequence([b, c, a], enforce_sorted=True)
4599 
4600  # more dimensions
4601  maxlen = 9
4602  for num_dim in (0, 1, 2, 3):
4603  sequences = []
4604  lengths = []
4605  trailing_dims = [4] * num_dim
4606  for i in range(maxlen, 0, -1):
4607  seq_len = i * i
4608  lengths.append(seq_len)
4609  sequences.append(torch.rand(seq_len, 5, *trailing_dims))
4610  unsorted_sequences = [s.clone() for s in sequences]
4611  random.shuffle(unsorted_sequences)
4612  unsorted_sequences_lengths = [t.size(0) for t in unsorted_sequences]
4613 
4614  # compatibility with other utilities
4615  for batch_first in (True, False):
4616  for enforce_sorted in (True, False):
4617  _compatibility_test(sequences, lengths, batch_first, enforce_sorted)
4618  _compatibility_test(unsorted_sequences, unsorted_sequences_lengths,
4619  batch_first)
4620 
4621  def test_pack_padded_sequence(self):
4622  def generate_test_case(sorted_lengths, should_shuffle):
4623  def pad(tensor, length):
4624  return torch.cat([tensor, tensor.new(length - tensor.size(0), *tensor.size()[1:]).zero_()])
4625 
4626  max_length = sorted_lengths[0]
4627  batch_sizes = [sum(map(bool, filter(lambda x: x >= i, sorted_lengths)))
4628  for i in range(1, max_length + 1)]
4629  offset = 0
4630  padded = torch.cat([pad(i * 100 + torch.arange(1., 5 * l + 1).view(l, 1, 5), max_length)
4631  for i, l in enumerate(sorted_lengths, 1)], 1)
4632  expected_data = [[torch.arange(1., 6) + (i + 1) * 100 + 5 * n for i in range(batch_size)]
4633  for n, batch_size in enumerate(batch_sizes)]
4634  expected_data = list(itertools.chain.from_iterable(expected_data))
4635  expected_data = torch.stack(expected_data, dim=0)
4636 
4637  if should_shuffle:
4638  # Shuffle the padded sequence to create an unsorted sequence
4639  permutation = list(range(len(sorted_lengths)))
4640  random.shuffle(permutation)
4641 
4642  unsorted_indices = torch.tensor(permutation)
4643  padded = padded.index_select(1, unsorted_indices)
4644  lengths = torch.tensor(sorted_lengths).index_select(0, unsorted_indices)
4645  else:
4646  unsorted_indices = None
4647  lengths = sorted_lengths
4648 
4649  return padded.requires_grad_(), lengths, expected_data, batch_sizes, unsorted_indices
4650 
4651  test_cases = [
4652  # sorted_lengths, should_shuffle
4653  [[10, 8, 4, 2, 2, 2, 1], False],
4654  [[11, 10, 8, 6, 4, 3, 1], False],
4655  [[11, 10, 8, 6, 4, 3, 1], True],
4656  ]
4657 
4658  for test_case, batch_first in itertools.product(test_cases, (True, False)):
4659  sorted_lengths, should_shuffle = test_case
4660  padded, lengths, expected_data, batch_sizes, unsorted_indices = generate_test_case(
4661  sorted_lengths, should_shuffle)
4662 
4663  src = padded
4664  if batch_first:
4665  src = src.transpose(0, 1)
4666 
4667  # check output
4668  packed = rnn_utils.pack_padded_sequence(src, lengths, batch_first=batch_first,
4669  enforce_sorted=not should_shuffle)
4670  self.assertEqual(packed.data.data, expected_data)
4671  self.assertEqual(packed.batch_sizes, batch_sizes)
4672  self.assertEqual(packed.unsorted_indices, unsorted_indices)
4673 
4674  # test inverse
4675  unpacked, unpacked_len = rnn_utils.pad_packed_sequence(packed, batch_first=batch_first)
4676  self.assertEqual(unpacked, src)
4677  self.assertEqual(unpacked_len, lengths)
4678 
4679  # check grad
4680  if padded.grad is not None:
4681  padded.grad.data.zero_()
4682  grad_output = unpacked.data.clone().normal_()
4683  unpacked.backward(grad_output)
4684  if batch_first:
4685  grad_output.transpose_(0, 1)
4686  for i, l in enumerate(lengths):
4687  self.assertEqual(padded.grad.data[:l, i], grad_output[:l, i])
4688  if l < 10:
4689  self.assertEqual(padded.grad.data[l:, i].abs().sum(), 0)
4690 
4691  # test error message
4692  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, 'You can pass `enforce_sorted=False`'):
4693  packed = rnn_utils.pack_padded_sequence(torch.randn(3, 3), [1, 3, 2])
4694 
4695  def _test_variable_sequence(self, device="cpu", dtype=torch.float):
4696  def pad(var, length):
4697  if var.size(0) == length:
4698  return var
4699  return torch.cat([var, var.new_zeros(length - var.size(0), *var.size()[1:])])
4700 
4701  def maybe_index_tuple(maybe_tuple_of_tensors, index):
4702  if maybe_tuple_of_tensors is None:
4703  return None
4704  return tuple(maybe_tuple_of_tensors[j][:, index:index + 1, :].contiguous()
4705  for j in range(2))
4706 
4707  def check_lengths(lengths, enforce_sorted, use_default_hiddens):
4708  input_size = 3
4709  hidden_size = 4
4710  num_layers = 2
4711  bidirectional = True
4712 
4713  max_length = max(lengths)
4714  x_leaf = torch.randn(max_length, len(lengths), input_size, device=device,
4715  dtype=dtype, requires_grad=True)
4716  num_directions = 2 if bidirectional else 1
4717  lstm = nn.LSTM(input_size, hidden_size, bidirectional=bidirectional,
4718  num_layers=num_layers).to(device, dtype)
4719  lstm2 = deepcopy(lstm).to(device, dtype)
4720  x = x_leaf
4721 
4722  hidden0 = None
4723  if not use_default_hiddens:
4724  hidden0 = tuple(torch.randn(num_directions * num_layers, len(lengths), hidden_size,
4725  device=device, dtype=dtype)
4726  for _ in range(2))
4727 
4728  # Compute sequences separately
4729  seq_outs = []
4730  seq_hiddens = []
4731  for i, l in enumerate(lengths):
4732  hidden_i = maybe_index_tuple(hidden0, i)
4733  out, hid = lstm2(x[:l, i:i + 1], hidden_i)
4734  out_pad = pad(out, max_length)
4735  seq_outs.append(out_pad)
4736  seq_hiddens.append(hid)
4737  seq_out = torch.cat(seq_outs, 1)
4738  seq_hidden = tuple(torch.cat(hids, 1) for hids in zip(*seq_hiddens))
4739 
4740  # Use packed format
4741  packed = rnn_utils.pack_padded_sequence(x, lengths, enforce_sorted=enforce_sorted)
4742  packed_out, packed_hidden = lstm(packed, hidden0)
4743  unpacked, unpacked_len = rnn_utils.pad_packed_sequence(packed_out)
4744 
4745  # Check forward
4746  prec = dtype2prec[dtype]
4747  self.assertEqual(packed_hidden, seq_hidden, prec)
4748  self.assertEqual(unpacked, seq_out, prec)
4749  self.assertEqual(unpacked_len, lengths, prec)
4750 
4751  # Check backward
4752  seq_out.sum().backward()
4753  grad_x = x_leaf.grad.data.clone()
4754  x_leaf.grad.data.zero_()
4755  unpacked.sum().backward()
4756 
4757  self.assertEqual(x_leaf.grad, grad_x, dtype2prec[dtype])
4758  for p1, p2 in zip(lstm.parameters(), lstm2.parameters()):
4759  prec = dtype2prec[dtype]
4760  if dtype == torch.float16:
4761  prec = 2e-2
4762  self.assertEqual(p1.grad, p2.grad, prec)
4763 
4764  tests = [
4765  # enforce_sorted, lengths
4766  [True, [5]],
4767  [False, [5]],
4768  [True, [10, 10, 6, 2, 2, 1, 1]],
4769  [False, [10, 10, 6, 2, 2, 1, 1]],
4770  [False, [2, 1, 3, 2, 10, 5, 3]],
4771  ]
4772 
4773  for enforce_sorted, seq_lens, in tests:
4774  for use_default_hiddens in (True, False):
4775  check_lengths(seq_lens, enforce_sorted, use_default_hiddens)
4776 
4777  def test_variable_sequence(self):
4778  self._test_variable_sequence()
4779 
4780  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
4781  @repeat_test_for_types(ALL_TENSORTYPES)
4782  def test_variable_sequence_cuda(self, dtype=torch.float):
4783  self._test_variable_sequence("cuda", dtype)
4784 
4785  def test_LSTM_cell(self):
4786  # this is just a smoke test; these modules are implemented through
4787  # autograd so no Jacobian test is needed
4788  for bias in (True, False):
4789  input = torch.randn(3, 10)
4790  hx = torch.randn(3, 20)
4791  cx = torch.randn(3, 20)
4792  lstm = nn.LSTMCell(10, 20, bias=bias)
4793  for _ in range(6):
4794  hx, cx = lstm(input, (hx, cx))
4795 
4796  (hx + cx).sum().backward()
4797 
4798  @unittest.skipIf(not (TEST_CUDNN and TEST_MULTIGPU), 'CUDNN or multi-gpu not available')
4799  def test_cudnn_rnn_dropout_states_device(self):
4800  rnn = nn.RNN(10, 20, num_layers=2, dropout=.5)
4801  device = 1
4802  input = torch.randn(5, 4, 10).cuda(device)
4803  rnn.cuda(device)
4804  hx = torch.randn(2, 4, 20).cuda(device)
4805  output = rnn(input, hx)
4806 
4807  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDNN, 'CUDNN not available')
4808  @skipIfRocm
4809  def test_cudnn_weight_format(self):
4810  rnns = [
4811  nn.LSTM(10, 20, batch_first=True),
4812  nn.GRU(10, 20, batch_first=True),
4813  nn.RNN(10, 20, batch_first=True)
4814  ]
4815  first_warn = True
4816  for rnn in rnns:
4817  rnn.cuda()
4818  input = Variable(torch.randn(5, 4, 10).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4819  hx = Variable(torch.randn(1, 5, 20).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4820  all_vars = [input, hx] + list(rnn.parameters())
4821  if isinstance(rnn, nn.LSTM):
4822  cx = Variable(torch.randn(1, 5, 20).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4823  all_vars[2:2] = [cx]
4824  hx = (hx, cx)
4825 
4826  output = rnn(input, hx)
4827  output[0].sum().backward()
4828  grads = [v.grad.data.clone() for v in all_vars]
4829  for v in all_vars:
4830  v.grad.data.zero_()
4831 
4832  # Weights will no longer view onto the same chunk of memory
4833  weight = all_vars[4]
4834  weight_data = weight.data.clone()
4835  with torch.no_grad():
4836  weight.set_(weight_data)
4837 
4838  for _ in range(2):
4839  with warnings.catch_warnings(record=True) as w:
4840  output_noncontig = rnn(input, hx)
4841  if first_warn:
4842  self.assertEqual(len(w), 1)
4843  self.assertIn('weights are not part of single contiguous chunk of memory', w[0].message.args[0])
4844  first_warn = False
4845  warnings.resetwarnings()
4846  output_noncontig[0].sum().backward()
4847  grads_noncontig = [v.grad.data.clone() for v in all_vars]
4848  for v in all_vars:
4849  v.grad.data.zero_()
4850  self.assertEqual(output, output_noncontig)
4851  self.assertEqual(grads_noncontig, grads)
4852 
4853  # Make sure these still share storage
4854  weight_data[:] = 4
4855  self.assertEqual(weight_data, all_vars[4].data)
4856 
4857  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDNN, 'CUDNN not available')
4858  def test_cudnn_weight_tying(self):
4859  rnns = [
4860  nn.LSTM(10, 20, batch_first=True, bidirectional=True),
4861  nn.GRU(10, 20, batch_first=True, bidirectional=True),
4862  nn.RNN(10, 20, batch_first=True, bidirectional=True)
4863  ]
4864  for rnn in rnns:
4865  rnn.bias_ih_l0_reverse = rnn.bias_ih_l0
4866  rnn.cuda()
4867  input = Variable(torch.randn(5, 4, 10).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4868  hx = Variable(torch.randn(2, 5, 20).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4869  all_vars = [input, hx] + list(rnn.parameters())
4870  opt = torch.optim.SGD(rnn.parameters(), lr=0.1)
4871  opt.zero_grad()
4872  if isinstance(rnn, nn.LSTM):
4873  cx = Variable(torch.randn(2, 5, 20).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4874  all_vars[2:2] = [cx]
4875  hx = (hx, cx)
4876 
4877  with warnings.catch_warnings(record=True) as w:
4878  output = rnn(input, hx)
4879  output[0].sum().backward()
4880 
4881  opt.step()
4882  with warnings.catch_warnings(record=True) as w:
4883  output_cuda = rnn(input, hx)
4884  rnn.cpu()
4885  hx = (hx[0].cpu(), hx[1].cpu()) if isinstance(rnn, nn.LSTM) else hx.cpu()
4886  output_cpu = rnn(input.cpu(), hx)
4887  self.assertEqual(output_cuda, output_cpu)
4888 
4889  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
4890  @repeat_test_for_types(NO_HALF_TENSORTYPES)
4891  def test_cuda_rnn_fused(self, dtype=torch.float):
4892 
4893  def copy_rnn(rnn1, rnn2):
4894  for x_layer, y_layer in zip(rnn1.all_weights, rnn2.all_weights):
4895  for x, y in zip(x_layer, y_layer):
4896  x.data.copy_(y.data)
4897 
4898  def check_rnn_grads(rnn1, rnn2):
4899  for x_layer, y_layer in zip(rnn1.all_weights, rnn2.all_weights):
4900  for x, y in zip(x_layer, y_layer):
4901  self.assertEqual(x.grad, y.grad, prec=5e-5)
4902 
4903  input_size = 10
4904  hidden_size = 6
4905  num_layers = 2
4906  seq_length = 7
4907  batch = 6
4908  input_val = torch.randn(seq_length, batch, input_size, dtype=dtype)
4909  grad_output = torch.randn(seq_length, batch, hidden_size, dtype=dtype)
4910  hx_val = torch.randn(num_layers, batch, hidden_size, dtype=dtype)
4911  grad_hy = torch.randn(num_layers, batch, hidden_size, dtype=dtype)
4912  with torch.backends.cudnn.flags(enabled=False):
4913  for module in (nn.GRU, nn.LSTM):
4914  for bias in (True, False):
4915  rnn = module(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers, bias=bias).to(dtype)
4916  rnn_cuda = module(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers, bias=bias).to("cuda", dtype)
4917  copy_rnn(rnn, rnn_cuda)
4918 
4919  is_lstm = isinstance(rnn, nn.LSTM)
4920  if is_lstm:
4921  hx = (Variable(hx_val.clone(), requires_grad=True),
4922  Variable(hx_val.clone().add(1), requires_grad=True))
4923  hx_cuda = (Variable(hx_val.clone().cuda(), requires_grad=True),
4924  Variable(hx_val.clone().cuda().add(1), requires_grad=True))
4925  else:
4926  hx = Variable(hx_val.clone(), requires_grad=True)
4927  hx_cuda = Variable(hx_val.clone().cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4928 
4929  inp = Variable(input_val.clone(), requires_grad=True)
4930  inp_cu = Variable(input_val.clone().cuda(), requires_grad=True)
4931  output1, hy1 = rnn(inp, hx)
4932  output2, hy2 = rnn_cuda(inp_cu, hx_cuda)
4933  if is_lstm:
4934  torch.autograd.backward(
4935  [output1, hy1[0], hy1[1]], [grad_output, grad_hy, grad_hy + 1]
4936  )
4937  torch.autograd.backward(
4938  [output2, hy2[0], hy2[1]],
4939  [grad_output.cuda(), grad_hy.cuda(), (grad_hy + 1).cuda()]
4940  )
4941  else:
4942  torch.autograd.backward([output1, hy1], [grad_output, grad_hy])
4943  torch.autograd.backward([output2, hy2], [grad_output.cuda(), grad_hy.cuda()])
4944 
4945  self.assertEqual(output1, output2)
4946  self.assertEqual(hy1, hy2)
4947 
4948  check_rnn_grads(rnn, rnn_cuda)
4949  self.assertEqual(inp.grad.data, inp_cu.grad.data)
4950  if is_lstm:
4951  self.assertEqual(hx[0].grad.data, hx_cuda[0].grad.data)
4952  self.assertEqual(hx[1].grad.data, hx_cuda[1].grad.data)
4953  else:
4954  self.assertEqual(hx.grad.data, hx_cuda.grad.data)
4955 
4956  def test_rnn_args_check(self):
4957  input_size = 3
4958  hidden_size = 5
4959  num_layers = 2
4960  batch_size = 4
4961  seq_len = 6
4962  num_directions = 1
4963  bad_size = 7 # prime number so that no size can divide it.
4964 
4965  def test(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode):
4966  for input, hidden in get_inputs(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode):
4967  model = getattr(nn, mode)(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers)
4968  self.assertRaises(RuntimeError, lambda: model(input, hidden))
4969 
4970  correct_input_shape = (seq_len, batch_size, input_size)
4971  correct_hidden_shape = (num_layers * num_directions, batch_size, hidden_size)
4972 
4973  def update_shape(shape, dim, new_dim_size):
4974  new_shape = list(shape)
4975  new_shape[dim] = new_dim_size
4976  return tuple(new_shape)
4977 
4978  def get_inputs(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode):
4979  '''returns list( tuple(input, hidden) )
4980  where input, hidden are inputs to a model'''
4981  input = torch.randn(input_shape)
4982  hidden = torch.randn(hidden_shape)
4983  if mode != 'LSTM':
4984  return [(input, hidden)]
4985  if hidden_shape == correct_hidden_shape:
4986  return [(input, (hidden, hidden))]
4987  good_hidden = torch.randn(correct_hidden_shape)
4988  return [
4989  (input, (hidden, good_hidden)),
4990  (input, (good_hidden, hidden)),
4991  ]
4992 
4993  rnn_modes = ['RNN', 'GRU', 'LSTM']
4994  for mode in rnn_modes:
4995  # Incorrect input batch size
4996  input_shape = update_shape(correct_input_shape, 1, bad_size)
4997  hidden_shape = correct_hidden_shape
4998  test(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode)
4999 
5000  # Incorrect hidden batch size
5001  input_shape = correct_input_shape
5002  hidden_shape = update_shape(correct_hidden_shape, 1, bad_size)
5003  test(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode)
5004 
5005  # Incorrect input size
5006  input_shape = update_shape(correct_input_shape, 2, bad_size)
5007  hidden_shape = correct_hidden_shape
5008  test(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode)
5009 
5010  # Incorrect hidden size
5011  input_shape = correct_input_shape
5012  hidden_shape = update_shape(correct_hidden_shape, 2, bad_size)
5013  test(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode)
5014 
5015  # Incorrect hidden[0]
5016  input_shape = correct_input_shape
5017  hidden_shape = update_shape(correct_hidden_shape, 0, bad_size)
5018  test(input_shape, hidden_shape, mode)
5019 
5020  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_MULTIGPU, "multi-GPU not supported")
5021  def test_rnn_check_device(self):
5022  input_size = 3
5023  hidden_size = 5
5024  num_layers = 2
5025  batch_size = 4
5026  seq_len = 6
5027  num_directions = 1
5028 
5029  correct_input_shape = (seq_len, batch_size, input_size)
5030  correct_hidden_shape = (num_layers * num_directions, batch_size, hidden_size)
5031  rnn_modes = ['RNN', 'GRU', 'LSTM']
5032 
5033  for mode in rnn_modes:
5034  model = getattr(nn, mode)(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers)
5035  input = torch.randn(correct_input_shape)
5036  hidden = torch.randn(correct_hidden_shape)
5037 
5038  # input and weights are not at the same device
5039  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError,
5040  "Input and parameter tensors are not at the same device"):
5041  model(input.to('cuda:0'))
5042 
5043  # input and hiddens are not at the same device
5044  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError,
5045  r"Input and hidden tensors are not at the same device"):
5046  if mode == 'LSTM':
5047  model(input, (hidden.to('cuda:0'), hidden.to('cuda:0')))
5048  else:
5049  model(input, (hidden.to('cuda:0')))
5050 
5051  # hidden tensors are not at the same CUDA device
5052  if mode == 'LSTM':
5053  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError,
5054  "Input and hidden tensors are not at the same device"):
5055  model(input.to('cuda:0'), (hidden.to('cuda:0'), hidden.to('cuda:1')))
5056 
5057  def test_rnn_initial_hidden_state(self):
5058  rnn_modes = ['RNN', 'GRU', 'LSTM']
5059  for mode in rnn_modes:
5060  rnn = getattr(nn, mode)(30, 20, 2)
5061  input = torch.randn(10, 32, 30)
5062  hidden = torch.zeros(2, 32, 20)
5063 
5064  if mode == 'LSTM':
5065  hidden = (hidden, hidden)
5066  output1, hidden1 = rnn(input, hidden)
5067  output2, hidden2 = rnn(input)
5068  self.assertEqual(output1, output2)
5069  self.assertEqual(hidden1, hidden2)
5070 
5071  def _test_rnn_retain_variables(self, device="cpu", dtype=torch.double):
5072  rnns = [nn.LSTM(10, 20, num_layers=2).to(device, dtype),
5073  nn.GRU(10, 20, num_layers=2).to(device, dtype),
5074  nn.RNN(10, 20, num_layers=2).to(device, dtype)]
5075  for rnn in rnns:
5076  input = torch.randn(5, 6, 10, device=device, dtype=dtype, requires_grad=True)
5077  output = rnn(input)
5078  output[0].sum().backward(retain_graph=True)
5079  grads = [input.grad.data.clone()] + [p.grad.data.clone() for p in rnn.parameters()]
5080  for _ in range(4):
5081  rnn.zero_grad()
5082  input.grad.data.zero_()
5083  output[0].sum().backward(retain_graph=True)
5084  grads2 = [input.grad.data] + [p.grad.data for p in rnn.parameters()]
5085  self.assertEqual(grads, grads2)
5086 
5087  def test_rnn_retain_variables(self):
5088  self._test_rnn_retain_variables()
5089 
5090  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
5091  @repeat_test_for_types(ALL_TENSORTYPES)
5092  def test_rnn_retain_variables_cuda(self, dtype=torch.float):
5093  with torch.backends.cudnn.flags(enabled=False):
5094  self._test_rnn_retain_variables("cuda", dtype)
5095  self._test_rnn_retain_variables("cuda", dtype)
5096 
5097  def _test_RNN_cpu_vs_cudnn(self, dropout):
5098 
5099  def forward_backward(cuda, rnn, input_val, hx_val, grad_output, grad_hy, weights_val):
5100  is_lstm = isinstance(rnn, nn.LSTM)
5101 
5102  for x_layer, y_layer in zip(rnn.all_weights, weights_val):
5103  for x, y in zip(x_layer, y_layer):
5104  x.data.copy_(y.data)
5105 
5106  if isinstance(input_val, rnn_utils.PackedSequence):
5107  input = rnn_utils.PackedSequence(
5108  Variable(input_val.data.data, requires_grad=True), input_val.batch_sizes)
5109  input_var = input.data
5110  else:
5111  input = Variable(input_val.clone(), requires_grad=True)
5112  input_var = input
5113  if is_lstm:
5114  hx = (Variable(hx_val.clone(), requires_grad=True),
5115  Variable(hx_val.add(1), requires_grad=True))
5116  else:
5117  hx = Variable(hx_val.clone(), requires_grad=True)
5118 
5119  if cuda:
5120  rnn.cuda()
5121  input_var.data = input_var.data.cuda()
5122  if is_lstm:
5123  hx[0].data = hx[0].data.cuda()
5124  hx[1].data = hx[1].data.cuda()
5125  else:
5126  hx.data = hx.data.cuda()
5127  grad_hy = grad_hy.cuda()
5128  grad_output = grad_output.cuda()
5129 
5130  output, hy = rnn(input, hx)
5131 
5132  if isinstance(output, rnn_utils.PackedSequence):
5133  output = output.data
5134 
5135  if is_lstm:
5136  torch.autograd.backward([output, hy[0], hy[1]], [grad_output, grad_hy, grad_hy + 1])
5137  else:
5138  torch.autograd.backward([output, hy], [grad_output, grad_hy])
5139 
5140  return {'output': output.data,
5141  'hy': hy[0].data if is_lstm else hy.data,
5142  'weights': rnn.all_weights,
5143  'grad_input': input_var.grad.data,
5144  'grad_hx': hx[0].grad.data if is_lstm else hx.grad.data,
5145  'cy': hy[1].data if is_lstm else None,
5146  'grad_cx': hx[1].grad.data if is_lstm else None}
5147 
5148  input_size = 10
5149  hidden_size = 6
5150  num_layers = 2
5151  seq_length = 7
5152  batch = 6
5153 
5154  def make_noncontig(tensor):
5155  ndim = tensor.dim()
5156  return torch.stack([tensor.clone().zero_(), tensor], ndim).select(ndim, 1)
5157 
5158  def compare_cpu_gpu(outputs_cpu, outputs_gpu):
5159  self.assertEqual(list(outputs_cpu.keys()), list(outputs_gpu.keys()))
5160  for key in outputs_cpu.keys():
5161  if key != 'weights':
5162  self.assertEqual(outputs_cpu[key], outputs_gpu[key], prec=5e-5, message=key)
5163 
5164  # check grad weights separately, as nested dict
5165  for cpu_layer_weight, gpu_layer_weight in zip(outputs_cpu['weights'], outputs_gpu['weights']):
5166  for (cpu_weight, gpu_weight) in zip(cpu_layer_weight, gpu_layer_weight):
5167  self.assertEqual(cpu_weight.grad.data, gpu_weight.grad.data, prec=5e-5)
5168 
5169  for module in (nn.RNN, nn.LSTM, nn.GRU):
5170  for bias, bidirectional, batch_first, contig, variable_len, lens_as_tensor \
5171  in product((True, False), repeat=6):
5172 
5173  num_directions = 2 if bidirectional else 1
5174  if batch_first:
5175  input_val = torch.randn(batch, seq_length, input_size)
5176  grad_output = torch.randn(batch, seq_length, hidden_size * num_directions)
5177  else:
5178  input_val = torch.randn(seq_length, batch, input_size)
5179  grad_output = torch.randn(seq_length, batch, hidden_size * num_directions)
5180 
5181  if not contig:
5182  grad_output = make_noncontig(grad_output)
5183  grad_hy = make_noncontig(grad_hy)
5184  input_var = make_noncontig(input_val)
5185  hx_val = make_noncontig(hx_val)
5186 
5187  hx_val = torch.randn(num_layers * num_directions, batch, hidden_size)
5188  grad_hy = torch.randn(num_layers * num_directions, batch, hidden_size)
5189 
5190  if variable_len:
5191  lengths = [7, 5, 5, 2, 1, 1]
5192  if lens_as_tensor:
5193  lengths = torch.tensor(lengths, dtype=torch.long)
5194  input_val = rnn_utils.pack_padded_sequence(input_val, lengths, batch_first=batch_first)
5195  grad_output = rnn_utils.pack_padded_sequence(grad_output, lengths, batch_first=batch_first).data
5196 
5197  rnn = module(input_size,
5198  hidden_size,
5199  num_layers,
5200  bias=bias,
5201  dropout=dropout,
5202  bidirectional=bidirectional,
5203  batch_first=batch_first)
5204 
5205  outputs_cpu = forward_backward(
5206  False, rnn, input_val, hx_val, grad_output, grad_hy, rnn.all_weights)
5207 
5208  rnn_gpu = module(input_size,
5209  hidden_size,
5210  num_layers,
5211  bias=bias,
5212  dropout=dropout,
5213  bidirectional=bidirectional,
5214  batch_first=batch_first)
5215 
5216  outputs_gpu = forward_backward(
5217  True, rnn_gpu, input_val, hx_val, grad_output, grad_hy, rnn.all_weights)
5218 
5219  compare_cpu_gpu(outputs_cpu, outputs_gpu)
5220 
5221  for nonlinearity in ('tanh', 'relu'):
5222  hx_val = torch.randn(num_layers, batch, hidden_size)
5223  input_val = torch.randn(seq_length, batch, input_size)
5224  grad_output = torch.randn(
5225  seq_length, batch, hidden_size * num_directions)
5226  grad_hy = torch.randn(
5227  num_layers * num_directions, batch, hidden_size)
5228 
5229  rnn = nn.RNN(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers, bias=bias, nonlinearity=nonlinearity)
5230  outputs_cpu = forward_backward(False, rnn, input_val, hx_val, grad_output, grad_hy, rnn.all_weights)
5231 
5232  rnn_gpu = nn.RNN(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers, bias=bias, nonlinearity=nonlinearity)
5233  outputs_gpu = forward_backward(True, rnn_gpu, input_val, hx_val, grad_output, grad_hy, rnn.all_weights)
5234 
5235  compare_cpu_gpu(outputs_cpu, outputs_gpu)
5236 
5237  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDNN, "needs cudnn")
5238  @default_tensor_type(torch.FloatTensor) # FIXME: just until torch.cuda.DoubleTensor.sum() implemented
5239  def test_RNN_cpu_vs_cudnn_no_dropout(self):
5240  self._test_RNN_cpu_vs_cudnn(0)
5241 
5242  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDNN, "needs cudnn")
5243  def test_RNN_cudnn_weight_norm(self):
5244  input_size = 10
5245  hidden_size = 6
5246  num_layers = 2
5247  seq_length = 7
5248  batch = 6
5249  m = nn.LSTM(input_size, hidden_size, num_layers).cuda()
5250  input = torch.randn(seq_length, batch, input_size).cuda()
5251  expected_output = m(input)
5252  # add weight normalization
5253  name = 'weight_hh_l0'
5254  m = torch.nn.utils.weight_norm(m, name=name)
5255  # otherwise, subsequent warnings will be hidden, and further tests rely on them
5256  warnings.simplefilter("always")
5257  self.assertEqual(m(input), expected_output)
5258 
5259  # remove weight norm
5260  m = torch.nn.utils.remove_weight_norm(m, name=name)
5261  self.assertEqual(m(input), expected_output)
5262 
5263  @unittest.skipIf(not (TEST_CUDNN and TEST_CUDNN_VERSION >= 5103), "needs cudnn >= 5.1")
5264  @default_tensor_type(torch.FloatTensor) # FIXME: just until torch.cuda.DoubleTensor.sum() implemented
5265  def test_RNN_cpu_vs_cudnn_with_dropout(self):
5266  # Because of dropout randomness, can only compare dropout=0 and dropout=1
5267  self._test_RNN_cpu_vs_cudnn(1)
5268 
5269  @unittest.skipIf(not (TEST_CUDNN and TEST_CUDNN_VERSION >= 5103), "needs cudnn >= 5.1")
5270  def test_RNN_dropout(self):
5271  # checking the assumption that cuDNN sticks dropout in between
5272  # RNN layers
5273  for p in (0, 0.276, 0.731, 1):
5274  for train in (True, False):
5275  for cuda in (True, False):
5276  rnn = nn.RNN(10, 1000, 2, bias=False, dropout=p, nonlinearity='relu')
5277  if cuda:
5278  rnn.cuda()
5279 
5280  if train:
5281  rnn.train()
5282  else:
5283  rnn.eval()
5284  rnn.weight_ih_l0.data.fill_(1)
5285  rnn.weight_hh_l0.data.fill_(1)
5286  rnn.weight_ih_l1.data.fill_(1)
5287  rnn.weight_hh_l1.data.fill_(1)
5288  input = torch.ones(1, 1, 10)
5289  hx = torch.zeros(2, 1, 1000)
5290  if cuda:
5291  input = input.cuda()
5292  hx = hx.cuda()
5293 
5294  output, hy = rnn(input, hx)
5295  self.assertEqual(output.data.min(), output.data.max())
5296  output_val = output.data[0][0][0]
5297  if p == 0 or not train:
5298  self.assertEqual(output_val, 10000)
5299  elif p == 1:
5300  self.assertEqual(output_val, 0)
5301  else:
5302  self.assertGreater(output_val, 8000)
5303  self.assertLess(output_val, 12000)
5304  denorm_mod = (output_val * (1 - p)) % 10
5305  self.assertLess(min(denorm_mod, 10 - denorm_mod), 1e-2)
5306 
5307  self.assertEqual(hy[0].data.min(), hy[0].data.max())
5308  self.assertEqual(hy[1].data.min(), hy[1].data.max())
5309  self.assertEqual(hy.data[0][0][0], 10)
5310  self.assertEqual(hy.data[1][0][0], output_val)
5311 
5312  @unittest.skipIf(not (TEST_CUDNN and TEST_CUDNN_VERSION >= 5103), "needs cudnn >= 5.1")
5313  def test_RNN_dropout_state(self):
5314  import sys
5315  if sys.version_info[0] == 2:
5316  import cPickle as pickle
5317  else:
5318  import pickle
5319  for p in (0, 0.1234):
5320  for train in (True, False):
5321  for cuda in (True, False):
5322  rnn = nn.RNN(100, 100, 2, bias=False, dropout=p, nonlinearity='relu')
5323  if cuda:
5324  rnn.cuda()
5325 
5326  if train:
5327  rnn.train()
5328  else:
5329  rnn.eval()
5330  input = torch.rand(1, 1, 100)
5331  hx = torch.rand(2, 1, 100)
5332  if cuda:
5333  input = input.cuda()
5334  hx = hx.cuda()
5335 
5336  output1, hy1 = rnn(input, hx)
5337  output2, hy2 = rnn(input, hx)
5338 
5339  rnn_pickle = pickle.dumps(rnn)
5340  rnn2 = pickle.loads(rnn_pickle)
5341  rnn2.flatten_parameters()
5342  output3, hy3 = rnn2(input, hx)
5343 
5344  if p == 0 or not train:
5345  self.assertEqual(output1, output2)
5346  self.assertEqual(output1, output3)
5347  self.assertEqual(hy1, hy2)
5348  self.assertEqual(hy1, hy3)
5349  else:
5350  self.assertNotEqual(output1, output2)
5351  self.assertNotEqual(output1, output3)
5352  self.assertNotEqual(hy1, hy2)
5353  self.assertNotEqual(hy1, hy3)
5354 
5355  @unittest.skipIf(not (TEST_CUDNN and TEST_CUDNN_VERSION >= 5103), "needs cudnn >= 5.1")
5356  def test_RNN_change_dropout(self):
5357  for train, cuda in product((True, False), repeat=2):
5358  rnn = nn.RNN(100, 100, 2, dropout=0, nonlinearity='relu')
5359  input = torch.rand(3, 2, 100)
5360  if cuda:
5361  input.data = input.data.cuda()
5362  rnn.cuda()
5363 
5364  if train:
5365  rnn.train()
5366  else:
5367  rnn.eval()
5368 
5369  prev_output = None
5370  for p in (0, 0.5, 0, 0.7, 0.2, 1, 0.2, 0):
5371  rnn.dropout = p
5372  output1, hy1 = rnn(input)
5373  output2, hy2 = rnn(input)
5374 
5375  if p == 0 or p == 1 or not train:
5376  self.assertEqual(output1, output2)
5377  self.assertEqual(hy1, hy2)
5378  else:
5379  self.assertNotEqual(output1, output2)
5380  self.assertNotEqual(hy1, hy2)
5381 
5382  if prev_output is not None:
5383  if not train:
5384  self.assertEqual(output1.data, prev_output)
5385  self.assertEqual(output2.data, prev_output)
5386  else:
5387  self.assertNotEqual(output1.data, prev_output)
5388  self.assertNotEqual(output2.data, prev_output)
5389  prev_output = output1.data
5390 
5391  def _verify_pixel_shuffle(self, input, output, upscale_factor):
5392  for c in range(output.size(1)):
5393  for h in range(output.size(2)):
5394  for w in range(output.size(3)):
5395  height_idx = h // upscale_factor
5396  weight_idx = w // upscale_factor
5397  channel_idx = (upscale_factor * (h % upscale_factor)) + (w % upscale_factor) + \
5398  (c * upscale_factor ** 2)
5399  self.assertEqual(output[:, c, h, w], input[:, channel_idx, height_idx, weight_idx])
5400 
5401  def test_inplace_thnn(self):
5402  modules = [nn.ReLU, nn.ELU, nn.SELU, nn.CELU, nn.RReLU]
5403  for mod in modules:
5404  r = mod(inplace=True)
5405  input = torch.randn(5, 5, requires_grad=True)
5406  output = r(input + 0)
5407  grad_output = torch.randn(5, 5)
5408  grad_output_clone = grad_output.clone()
5409  output.backward(grad_output)
5410  self.assertEqual(grad_output, grad_output_clone)
5411 
5412  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
5413  @repeat_test_for_types(ALL_TENSORTYPES)
5414  def test_noncontig_conv_grad_cuda(self, dtype=torch.float):
5415  # FIXME: remove after adding non-contiguous grad tests for all modules
5416  module = nn.Conv2d(3, 5, kernel_size=3, padding=1).to("cuda", dtype)
5417  input = torch.randn(2, 3, 10, 10, dtype=dtype, device="cuda", requires_grad=True)
5418  output = module(input)
5419 
5420  grad = torch.randn(2, 2, 5, 10, 10, dtype=dtype, device="cuda")[:, 1]
5421  assert not grad.is_contiguous()
5422  output.backward(grad, retain_graph=True)
5423  self.assertIsNotNone(input.grad)
5424  result = input.grad.data.clone()
5425  input.grad.data.zero_()
5426 
5427  output.backward(grad.contiguous())
5428  self.assertEqual(result, input.grad.data, dtype2prec[dtype])
5429 
5430  def test_pixel_shuffle(self):
5431  batch_size = random.randint(1, 3)
5432  upscale_factor = random.randint(2, 5)
5433  channels = random.randint(1, 4) * upscale_factor ** 2
5434  height = random.randint(5, 10)
5435  width = random.randint(5, 10)
5436 
5437  input = torch.rand(batch_size, channels, height, width, requires_grad=True)
5438  ps = nn.PixelShuffle(upscale_factor)
5439  output = ps(input)
5440  self._verify_pixel_shuffle(input.data, output.data, upscale_factor)
5441  output.backward(output.data)
5442  self.assertEqual(input.data, input.grad.data)
5443 
5444  def test_elu_inplace_view(self):
5445  v = torch.tensor([1.0, -1.0, 1.0, -1.0], requires_grad=True)
5446 
5447  def func(root):
5448  x = root.clone()
5449  view = x.narrow(0, 1, 2)
5450  res = F.elu(view, inplace=True)
5451  self.assertIs(res, view)
5452  return x
5453 
5454  gradcheck(func, [v])
5455  gradgradcheck(func, [v])
5456 
5457  def test_relu_inplace_view(self):
5458  v = torch.tensor([1.0, -1.0, 1.0, -1.0], requires_grad=True)
5459 
5460  def func(root):
5461  x = root.clone()
5462  view = x.narrow(0, 1, 2)
5463  res = F.relu(view, inplace=True)
5464  self.assertIs(res, view)
5465  return x
5466 
5467  gradcheck(func, [v])
5468  gradgradcheck(func, [v])
5469 
5470  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, 'CUDA not available')
5471  def test_PReLU_backward_requires_grad_false(self):
5472  m = nn.PReLU().to('cuda')
5473  x = torch.randn(2, 3, 4, 5, requires_grad=False, device='cuda')
5474  y = m(x)
5475  y.mean().backward()
5476  self.assertEqual(x.grad, None)
5477 
5478  def test_bce_loss_always_nonnegative(self):
5479  target = torch.ones(5)
5480  input = torch.ones(5)
5481  self.assertEqual((nn.BCELoss()(input, target) < 0).sum(), 0)
5482 
5483  target = torch.zeros(5)
5484  input = torch.zeros(5)
5485  self.assertEqual((nn.BCELoss()(input, target) < 0).sum(), 0)
5486 
5487  def test_bce_with_logits_raises_if_target_and_input_are_different_size(self):
5488  target = torch.rand(5)
5489  input = torch.rand(5, 1)
5490  with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
5491  nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss()(input, target)
5492 
5493  target = torch.rand(5, 1)
5494  input = torch.rand(5)
5495  with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
5496  nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss()(input, target)
5497 
5498  def test_bce_with_logits_gives_same_result_as_sigmoid_and_bce_loss(self):
5499  sigmoid = nn.Sigmoid()
5500 
5501  target = torch.rand(64, 4)
5502  output = torch.rand(64, 4) - 0.5
5503 
5504  self.assertEqual(nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss()(output, target), nn.BCELoss()(sigmoid(output), target))
5505 
5506  weight = torch.rand(4)
5507  self.assertEqual(nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)(output, target), nn.BCELoss(weight)(sigmoid(output), target))
5508 
5509  target = torch.zeros(4, 1, dtype=torch.float)
5510  output = torch.empty(4, 1, dtype=torch.float).fill_(-100)
5511 
5512  self.assertEqual(nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss()(output, target), nn.BCELoss()(sigmoid(output), target))
5513 
5514  self.assertEqual(nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(reduction='none')(output, target),
5515  nn.BCELoss(reduction='none')(sigmoid(output), target))
5516 
5517  weight = torch.rand(1, dtype=torch.float)
5518  self.assertEqual(nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)(output, target), nn.BCELoss(weight)(sigmoid(output), target))
5519 
5520  def test_bce_with_logits_has_correct_grad_at_zero(self):
5521  output = torch.zeros(3, 1, requires_grad=True)
5522  target = torch.zeros(3, 1)
5523  nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(reduction='sum')(output, target).backward()
5524  expected_grad = torch.empty(3, 1).fill_(0.5)
5525  self.assertEqual(output.grad, expected_grad)
5526 
5527  def test_bce_with_logits_broadcasts_weights(self):
5528  target = torch.rand(16, 4)
5529  output = torch.rand(16, 4) - 0.5
5530 
5531  weight = torch.rand(4)
5532  out1 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)(output, target)
5533 
5534  weight = weight.expand(16, 4).contiguous()
5535  out2 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)(output, target)
5536 
5537  self.assertEqual(out1, out2)
5538 
5539  weight = torch.rand(16, 1)
5540  out1 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)(output, target)
5541 
5542  weight = weight.expand(16, 4).contiguous()
5543  out2 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(weight)(output, target)
5544 
5545  self.assertEqual(out1, out2)
5546 
5547  def test_bce_with_logits_ones_in_pos_weights_are_the_same_as_none(self):
5548  target = torch.rand(64, 4)
5549  output = torch.rand(64, 4) - 0.5
5550  pos_weight = torch.ones(64, 4)
5551 
5552  self.assertEqual(nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss()(output, target),
5553  nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight)(output, target))
5554 
5555  def test_bce_with_logits_broadcasts_pos_weights(self):
5556  target = torch.rand(64, 4)
5557  output = torch.rand(64, 4) - 0.5
5558  pos_weight = torch.rand(4)
5559  out1 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight)(output, target)
5560 
5561  pos_weight1 = pos_weight.expand(1, 4)
5562  out2 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight1)(output, target)
5563 
5564  pos_weight2 = pos_weight.expand(64, 4)
5565  out3 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight2)(output, target)
5566 
5567  self.assertEqual(out1, out2)
5568  self.assertEqual(out1, out3)
5569 
5570  def test_bce_with_logits_with_pos_weight_has_correct_grad_at_zero(self):
5571  output = torch.zeros(3, 1, requires_grad=True)
5572  target = torch.zeros(3, 1)
5573  pos_weight = torch.ones(3, 1)
5574  nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight, reduction='sum')(output, target).backward()
5575  expected_grad = torch.empty(3, 1).fill_(0.5)
5576  grad = output.grad
5577  self.assertEqual(grad, expected_grad)
5578 
5579  def test_bce_with_logits_stability(self):
5580  output = torch.tensor([0., -120.])
5581  target = torch.tensor([0., 1.])
5582  pos_weight = torch.tensor([1., 1.])
5583 
5584  out1 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss()(output, target)
5585  self.assertTrue(torch.isfinite(out1).all().item())
5586 
5587  out2 = nn.BCEWithLogitsLoss(pos_weight=pos_weight)(output, target)
5588  self.assertTrue(torch.isfinite(out2).all().item())
5589 
5590  def test_bce_loss_broadcasts_weights(self):
5591  sigmoid = nn.Sigmoid()
5592  target = torch.rand(16, 4)
5593  output = torch.rand(16, 4) - 0.5
5594 
5595  weight = torch.rand(4)
5596  out1 = nn.BCELoss(weight)(sigmoid(output), target)
5597 
5598  weight = weight.expand(16, 4).contiguous()
5599  out2 = nn.BCELoss(weight)(sigmoid(output), target)
5600 
5601  self.assertEqual(out1, out2)
5602 
5603  weight = torch.rand(16, 1)
5604  out1 = nn.BCELoss(weight)(sigmoid(output), target)
5605 
5606  weight = weight.expand(16, 4).contiguous()
5607  out2 = nn.BCELoss(weight)(sigmoid(output), target)
5608 
5609  self.assertEqual(out1, out2)
5610 
5611  def test_elu_inplace_gradgrad(self):
5612  v = torch.randn(8, requires_grad=True)
5613 
5614  def func(root):
5615  x = root.clone()
5616  return F.elu(x, inplace=True)
5617 
5618  gradcheck(func, [v])
5619  gradgradcheck(func, [v])
5620 
5621  def test_hardtanh_inplace_gradgrad(self):
5622  v = torch.randn(8, requires_grad=True)
5623 
5624  def func(root):
5625  x = root.clone()
5626  return F.hardtanh(x, inplace=True)
5627 
5628  gradcheck(func, [v])
5629  gradgradcheck(func, [v])
5630 
5631  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, "CUDA unavailable")
5632  def test_batchnorm_cudnn_half(self):
5633  # THNN
5634  input = torch.randint(1, 10, (2, 3, 2, 2), dtype=torch.half, device="cuda", requires_grad=True)
5635  m = nn.BatchNorm2d(3).half().cuda()
5636  thnn_output = m(input)
5637  thnn_output.sum().backward()
5638  thnn_input_grad = input.grad.data.clone()
5639  self.assertEqual(thnn_output.type(), input.type())
5640  # cuDNN
5641  if TEST_CUDNN:
5642  input.grad = None
5643  m = m.float()
5644  cudnn_output = m(input)
5645  cudnn_output.sum().backward()
5646  cudnn_input_grad = input.grad.data.clone()
5647  self.assertEqual(cudnn_output.type(), input.type())
5648  self.assertEqual(cudnn_output, thnn_output)
5649  self.assertAlmostEqual(cudnn_input_grad, thnn_input_grad, delta=1e-3)
5650 
5651  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, "CUDA unavailable")
5652  @repeat_test_for_types([torch.float, torch.half])
5653  def test_batchnorm_large_batch(self, dtype=torch.float):
5654  bn = nn.BatchNorm1d(1).to('cuda', dtype)
5655  data = torch.rand(131072, 1, device="cuda", dtype=dtype)
5656  out = bn(data).sum().backward()
5657 
5658  def _test_batchnorm_update_stats(self, device="cpu", dtype=torch.float):
5659  module = nn.BatchNorm1d(3).to(device, dtype)
5660 
5661  data = torch.rand(4, 3, device=device, dtype=dtype)
5662 
5663  # training pass
5664  old_running_mean = module.running_mean.clone()
5665  old_running_var = module.running_var.clone()
5666  old_num_batches_tracked = module.num_batches_tracked.clone()
5667  module(data)
5668  self.assertNotEqual(old_running_mean, module.running_mean)
5669  self.assertNotEqual(old_running_var, module.running_var)
5670  self.assertEqual(old_num_batches_tracked + 1, module.num_batches_tracked)
5671 
5672  # eval pass
5673  module.eval()
5674  old_running_mean = module.running_mean.clone()
5675  old_running_var = module.running_var.clone()
5676  old_num_batches_tracked = module.num_batches_tracked.clone()
5677  module(data)
5678  self.assertEqual(old_running_mean, module.running_mean)
5679  self.assertEqual(old_running_var, module.running_var)
5680  self.assertEqual(old_num_batches_tracked, module.num_batches_tracked)
5681 
5682  def test_batchnorm_update_stats(self):
5683  self._test_batchnorm_update_stats()
5684 
5685  @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_CUDA, "CUDA unavailable")
5686  def test_batchnorm_update_stats_cuda(self):
5687  self._test_batchnorm_update_stats("cuda", torch.float)
5688  if TEST_CUDNN:
5689  with torch.backends.cudnn.flags(enabled=False):
5690  self._test_batchnorm_update_stats("cuda", torch.float)
5691 
5692  def test_batchnorm_raises_error_if_running_mean_is_not_same_size_as_input(self):
5693  input = torch.rand(2, 10)
5694  running_var = torch.rand(10)
5695  wrong_sizes = [9, 11]
5696  for size in wrong_sizes:
5697  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
5698  F.batch_norm(input, torch.rand(size), running_var)
5699 
5700  def test_batchnorm_raises_error_if_running_var_is_not_same_size_as_input(self):
5701  input = torch.rand(2, 10)
5702  running_mean = torch.rand(10)
5703  wrong_sizes = [9, 11]
5704  for size in wrong_sizes:
5705  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
5706  F.batch_norm(input, running_mean, torch.rand(size))
5707 
5708  def test_batchnorm_raises_error_if_weight_is_not_same_size_as_input(self):
5709  input = torch.rand(2, 10)
5710  running_mean = torch.rand(10)
5711  running_var = torch.rand(10)
5712  wrong_sizes = [9, 11]
5713  for size in wrong_sizes:
5714  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
5715  F.batch_norm(input, running_mean, running_var, weight=Parameter(torch.rand(size)))
5716 
5717  def test_batchnorm_raises_error_if_bias_is_not_same_size_as_input(self):
5718  input = torch.rand(2, 10)
5719  running_mean = torch.rand(10)
5720  running_var = torch.rand(10)
5721  wrong_sizes = [9, 11]
5722  for size in wrong_sizes:
5723  with self.assertRaises(RuntimeError):
5724  F.batch_norm(input, running_mean, running_var, bias=Parameter(torch.rand(size)))
5725 
5726  def _test_batchnorm_grad(self, device="cpu", dtype=torch.double):
5727  bs, n_feat, size_feat = 4, 5, 6
5728  input = torch.arange(bs * n_feat * size_feat, device=device,
5729  requires_grad=True, dtype=dtype).view(bs, n_feat, size_feat)
5730  weight = torch.arange(1, n_feat + 1, device=device, requires_grad=True, dtype=dtype)
5731  bias = torch.arange(n_feat, device=device, requires_grad=True, dtype=dtype)
5732  running_mean = 1 - torch.arange(n_feat, device=device, dtype=dtype)
5733  running_var = 2 * torch.arange(n_feat, device=device, dtype=dtype)
5734  for training in [False, True]:
5735  _assertGradAndGradgradChecks(self, F.batch_norm, (input, running_mean, running_var, weight, bias,
5736  training, 0.1, 0.0001))
5737 
5738  def _test_batchnorm_eval(self, device="cpu", dtype=torch.float):
5739  module = nn.BatchNorm1d(3).to(device, dtype)
5740  module.eval()
5741 
5742  data = torch.rand(4, 3, device=device, dtype=dtype, requires_grad=True)
5743  grad = torch.rand(4, 3, device=device, dtype=dtype)
5744 
5745  # 1st pass
5746  res1 = module(data)
5747  res1.backward(grad)
5748  grad1 = data.grad.clone()
5749 
5750  # 2nd pass
5751  if data.grad is not None:
5752  data.grad.data.zero_()
5753 
5754  res2 = module(data)
5755  res2.backward(grad)
5756  grad2 = data.grad.clone()
5757  self.assertEqual(res1, res2)
5758  self.assertEqual(grad1, grad2)
5759 
5760  # track_running_stats=False
5761  module = nn.BatchNorm1d(3, track_running_stats=False).to(device, dtype)
5762 
5763  data = torch.rand(4, 3, device=device, dtype=dtype, requires_grad=True)
5764  grad = torch.rand(4, 3, device=device, dtype=dtype)
5765 
5766  # 1st pass
5767  res1 = module(data)
5768  res1.backward(grad)
5769  grad1 = data.grad.clone()
5770 
5771  # set eval
5772  module.eval()
5773 
5774  # 2nd pass
5775  if data.grad is not None:
5776  data.grad.data.zero_()
5777 
5778  res2 = module(data)
5779  res2.backward(grad)
5780  grad2 = data.grad.clone()
5781  self.assertEqual(res1, res2)
5782  self.assertEqual(grad1, grad2)
5783 
5784  def _test_batchnorm_simple_average(self, test_type=torch.FloatTensor):
5785  module = nn.BatchNorm1d(3, momentum=None).type(test_type)
5786  zeros = torch.zeros(3).type(test_type)
5787  ones = torch.ones(3).type(test_type)
5788  self.assertEqual(module.running_mean, zeros)
5789  self.assertEqual(module.running_var, ones)
5790 
5791  data1 = torch.rand(4, 3).type(test_type)
5792  data2 = torch.rand(4, 3).type(test_type)
5793 
5794  # 1st pass
5795  res1 = module(data1)
5796  running_mean1 = module.running_mean.clone()
5797  running_var1 = module.running_var.clone()
5798  self.assertNotEqual(running_mean1, zeros)
5799  self.assertNotEqual(running_var1, ones)
5800 
5801  # reset stats
5802  module.reset_running_stats()
5803  self.assertEqual(module.running_mean, zeros)
5804  self.assertEqual(module.running_var, ones)
5805 
5806  # 2nd pass
5807  res2 = module(data2)
5808  running_mean2 = module.running_mean.clone()
5809  running_var2 = module.running_var.clone()
5810  self.assertNotEqual(running_mean2, zeros)
5811  self.assertNotEqual(running_var2, ones)
5812 
5813  # reset stats
5814  module.reset_running_stats()
5815  self.assertEqual(module.running_mean, zeros)
5816  self.assertEqual(module.running_var, ones)
5817 
5818  # 3rd (combined) pass
5819  res3 = module(data1)
5820  res4 = module(data2)
5821  self.assertEqual(res3, res1)
5822  self.assertEqual(res4, res2)
5823  self.assertAlmostEqual(module.running_mean, (running_mean1 + running_mean2) / 2)
5824  self.assertAlmostEqual(module.running_var, (running_var1 + running_var2) / 2)
5825 
5826  def test_pairwise_distance(self):
5827  input1 = torch.randn(4, 4, requires_grad=True)
5828  input2 = torch.randn(4, 4, requires_grad=True)
5829  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y: F.pairwise_distance(x, y), (input1, input2)))
5830 
5831  @skipIfRocm
5832  def test_pdist(self):
5833  for device, trans in itertools.product(device_(), [False, True]):
5834  inp = torch.randn(4, 5, dtype=torch.double, device=device, requires_grad=True)
5835  if trans:
5836  inp = inp.transpose(0, 1)
5837  for p in [0, 1, 2, 0.5, 1.5, 2.5, float('inf')]:
5838  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x: F.pdist(x, p), (inp,)))
5839 
5840  def test_pdist_zeros(self):
5841  """Test that grad is still valid when dist is 0"""
5842  for device in device_():
5843  inp = torch.randn(1, 3, dtype=torch.double, device=device, requires_grad=True).repeat([2, 1])
5844  for p in [0, 1, 2, 0.5, 1.5, 2.5, float('inf')]:
5845  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x: F.pdist(x, p), (inp,)))
5846 
5847  def test_pdist_empty_row(self):
5848  for device in device_():
5849  inp = torch.randn(1, 3, dtype=torch.double, device=device, requires_grad=True)
5850  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(F.pdist, (inp,)))
5851 
5852  def test_pdist_empty_col(self):
5853  for device in device_():
5854  inp = torch.randn(4, 0, dtype=torch.double, device=device, requires_grad=True)
5855  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(F.pdist, (inp,)))

5868  def test_cosine_embedding_loss_no_reduce(self):
5869  input1 = torch.randn(15, 10, requires_grad=True)
5870  input2 = torch.randn(15, 10, requires_grad=True)
5871  target = torch.randn(15).sign()
5872  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y, z: F.cosine_embedding_loss(
5873  x, y, z, reduction='none'), (input1, input2, target)))
5874  self.assertEqual(F.cosine_embedding_loss(input1, input2, target, reduction='none'),
5875  loss_reference_fns['CosineEmbeddingLoss'](input1, input2, target, reduction='none'))
5876 
5877  def test_cosine_embedding_loss_margin_no_reduce(self):
5878  input1 = torch.randn(15, 10, requires_grad=True)
5879  input2 = torch.randn(15, 10, requires_grad=True)
5880  target = torch.randn(15).sign()
5881  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y, z: F.cosine_embedding_loss(
5882  x, y, z, margin=0.5, reduction='none'), (input1, input2, target)))
5883  self.assertEqual(F.cosine_embedding_loss(input1, input2, target, margin=0.5, reduction='none'),
5884  loss_reference_fns['CosineEmbeddingLoss'](input1, input2, target,
5885  margin=0.5, reduction='none'))
5886 
5887  def test_margin_ranking_loss_no_reduce(self):

5889  input2 = torch.randn(15).mul_(10).requires_grad_()
5890  target = torch.randn(15).sign()

5892  x, y, z, reduction='none'), (input1, input2, target)))
5893  self.assertEqual(F.margin_ranking_loss(input1, input2, target, reduction='none'),
5894  loss_reference_fns['MarginRankingLoss'](input1, input2, target, reduction='none'))
5895 
5896  def test_margin_ranking_loss_margin_no_reduce(self):

5898  input2 = torch.randn(15).mul_(10).requires_grad_()
5899  target = torch.randn(15).sign()
5900  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y, z: F.margin_ranking_loss(
5901  x, y, z, margin=0.5, reduction='none'), (input1, input2, target)))
5902  self.assertEqual(F.margin_ranking_loss(input1, input2, target, margin=0.5, reduction='none'),
5903  loss_reference_fns['MarginRankingLoss'](input1, input2, target, margin=0.5, reduction='none'))
5904 
5905  def test_triplet_margin_loss(self):
5906  input1 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5907  input2 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5908  input3 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5909  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x1, x2, x3: F.triplet_margin_loss(
5910  x1, x2, x3), (input1, input2, input3)))
5911  self.assertEqual(F.triplet_margin_loss(input1, input2, input3),
5912  loss_reference_fns['TripletMarginLoss'](input1, input2, input3))
5913 
5914  def test_triplet_margin_loss_swap(self):
5915  input1 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5916  input2 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5917  input3 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5918  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x1, x2, x3: F.triplet_margin_loss(
5919  x1, x2, x3, swap=True), (input1, input2, input3)))
5920  self.assertEqual(F.triplet_margin_loss(input1, input2, input3, swap=True),
5921  loss_reference_fns['TripletMarginLoss'](input1, input2, input3, swap=True))
5922 
5923  def test_triplet_margin_loss_no_reduce(self):
5924  input1 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5925  input2 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5926  input3 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5927  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x1, x2, x3: F.triplet_margin_loss(
5928  x1, x2, x3, reduction='none'), (input1, input2, input3)))
5929  self.assertEqual(F.triplet_margin_loss(input1, input2, input3, reduction='none'),
5930  loss_reference_fns['TripletMarginLoss'](input1, input2, input3, reduction='none'))
5931 
5932  def test_triplet_margin_loss_swap_no_reduce(self):
5933  input1 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5934  input2 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5935  input3 = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5936  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x1, x2, x3: F.triplet_margin_loss(
5937  x1, x2, x3, swap=True, reduction='none'), (input1, input2, input3)))
5938  self.assertEqual(F.triplet_margin_loss(input1, input2, input3, swap=True, reduction='none'),
5939  loss_reference_fns['TripletMarginLoss'](input1, input2, input3, swap=True, reduction='none'))
5940 
5941  def test_pointwise_loss_target_grad_none_reduction(self):
5942  i = torch.randn(5, 10)
5943  t = torch.randn(5, 10, requires_grad=True)
5944  self.assertEqual(F.mse_loss(i, t, reduction='none').size(), t.size())
5945  self.assertEqual(F.l1_loss(i, t, reduction='none').size(), t.size())
5946 
5947  def test_pointwise_loss_broadcast(self):
5948  losses = {
5949  'mse_loss': lambda x, y, r: F.mse_loss(x, y, reduction=r),
5950  'l1_loss': lambda x, y, r: F.l1_loss(x, y, reduction=r),
5951  'smooth_l1_loss': lambda x, y, r: F.smooth_l1_loss(x, y, reduction=r),
5952  }
5953 
5954  input = torch.randn(2, 1, requires_grad=True)
5955  for _name, fn in losses.items():
5956  for requires_grad in [True, False]:
5957  # When target.requires_grad=True, its impl is in Python, while the other is in TH.
5958  target = torch.randn(2, 10, requires_grad=requires_grad)
5959  for reduction in ['none', 'mean', 'sum']:
5960  l = fn(input, target, reduction)
5961  if reduction == 'none':
5962  self.assertEqual(l.size(), target.size())
5963  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(fn, (input, target, reduction)))
5964 
5965  def test_cosine_similarity(self):
5966  input1 = torch.randn(4, 4, requires_grad=True)
5967  input2 = torch.randn(4, 4, requires_grad=True)
5968  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y: F.cosine_similarity(x, y), (input1, input2)))
5969 
5970  input1 = torch.randn(4, 5, 6, requires_grad=True)
5971  input2 = torch.randn(4, 5, 6, requires_grad=True)
5972  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y: F.cosine_similarity(x, y, dim=0), (input1, input2)))
5973  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y: F.cosine_similarity(x, y, dim=-1), (input1, input2)))
5974 
5975  input1 = torch.randn((), requires_grad=True)
5976  input2 = torch.randn((), requires_grad=True)
5977  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y: F.cosine_similarity(x, y, dim=0), (input1, input2)))
5978  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(lambda x, y: F.cosine_similarity(x, y, dim=-1), (input1, input2)))
5979 
5980  # Check cosine_similarity input/output shapes
5981  input_size = (1, 3, 2, 1)
5982  expected_size = (1, 2, 1)
5983  input1 = torch.randn(input_size, requires_grad=True)
5984  input2 = torch.randn(input_size, requires_grad=True)
5985  self.assertEqual(F.cosine_similarity(input1, input2, dim=1).size(), expected_size)
5986 
5987  # Check numerical precision, issue #18057
5988  vv1 = torch.tensor(list([float(i) for i in range(84)])).unsqueeze(0)
5989  vv2 = torch.tensor(list([float(i) for i in range(84)])).unsqueeze(0)
5990  out = F.cosine_similarity(vv1, vv2)
5991  self.assertLessEqual(out, 1.0)
5992 
5993  # Check dividing by 0.
5994  input1 = torch.randn(10).requires_grad_()
5995  input2 = torch.zeros_like(input1).requires_grad_()
5996  torch.cosine_similarity(input1, input2, 0).sum().backward()
5997  self.assertEqual(input1.grad, torch.zeros_like(input1))
5998  self.assertEqual(input2.grad, input1 * 1e8)
5999 
6000  def test_grid_sample_error_checking(self):
6001  input = torch.empty(1, 1, 2, 2)
6002  grid = torch.empty(1, 1, 1, 2)
6003 
6004  # assert no error
6005  F.grid_sample(input, grid)
6006 
6007  with self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, "but got: 'garbage'"):
6008  F.grid_sample(input, grid, mode='garbage')
6009 
6010  with self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, "but got: 'garbage'"):
6011  F.grid_sample(input, grid, padding_mode='garbage')
6012 
6013  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "expected input and grid to have same dtype"):
6014  F.grid_sample(input.float(), grid.double())
6015 
6016  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "expected 4D or 5D input"):
6017  F.grid_sample(input[0], grid)
6018 
6019  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "grid with same number of dimensions"):
6020  F.grid_sample(input, torch.empty(1, 1, 1, 1, 3))
6021 
6022  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "expected grid and input to have same batch size"):
6023  F.grid_sample(input, torch.empty(2, 1, 1, 2))
6024 
6025  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "expected grid to have size 2 in last dimension"):
6026  F.grid_sample(input, torch.empty(1, 1, 1, 3))
6027 
6028  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "expected input to have non-empty spatial dimensions"):
6029  F.grid_sample(torch.empty(1, 1, 0, 2), grid)
6030 
6031  if TEST_CUDA:
6032  with self.assertRaisesRegex(RuntimeError, "expected input and grid to be on same device"):
6033  F.grid_sample(input.cuda(), grid)
6034 
6035  def test_grid_sample(self):
6036  def test(N, C, H, W, mode, padding_mode):
6037  def test_shape(N, C, IH, IW, H, W, mode, padding_mode):
6038  for grid_dim_contig_order in [(0, 1, 2, 3), (0, 3, 1, 2), (3, 0, 1, 2), (0, 2, 1, 3)]:
6039  # grid_dim_contig_order specifies the dimension order that can
6040  # make grid to be contiguous.
6041  # i.e., grid.permute(grid_dim_contig_order) is contiguous.
6042  # e.g., with grid_dim_contig_order=[0, 3, 1, 2], grid should be
6043  # initialized with contiguous tensor of shape [N, 2, H, W]
6044  # and permuted to [N, H, W, 2] afterwards.
6045  grid_shape = [N, H, W, 2]
6046  grid_init_shape = [grid_shape[d] for d in grid_dim_contig_order]
6047  grid_fwd_permute = [None, None, None, None]
6048  for i, d in enumerate(grid_dim_contig_order):
6049  grid_fwd_permute[d] = i
6050 
6051  def get_grid(device='cpu', data=None):
6052  if data is not None:
6053  assert list(data.shape) == grid_shape
6054  data = data.permute(grid_dim_contig_order).to(device)
6055  else:
6056  data = torch.randn(grid_init_shape, device=device)
6057  grid = data.permute(grid_fwd_permute)
6058  assert grid.permute(grid_dim_contig_order).is_contiguous()
6059  return grid
6060 
6061  input_cpu = torch.randn(C, N, IH, IW).transpose(0, 1).requires_grad_()
6062  grid_cpu = get_grid().requires_grad_()
6063  out_cpu = F.grid_sample(input_cpu, grid_cpu, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6064  self.assertTrue(out_cpu.size() == torch.Size([N, C, H, W]))
6065 
6066  gradients = torch.randn_like(out_cpu)
6067  out_cpu.backward(gradients)
6068 
6069  if TEST_CUDA:
6070  input_cuda = input_cpu.detach().transpose(0, 1).cuda().transpose(0, 1).requires_grad_()
6071  grid_cuda = get_grid('cuda', grid_cpu.detach()).requires_grad_()
6072  out_cuda = F.grid_sample(input_cuda, grid_cuda, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6073  self.assertEqual(out_cpu, out_cuda)
6074 
6075  out_cuda.backward(gradients.cuda())
6076  self.assertEqual(input_cpu.grad, input_cuda.grad)
6077  self.assertEqual(grid_cpu.grad, grid_cuda.grad, prec=5e-5)
6078 
6079  # check that zero-dimensional input strides don't error out
6080  base_input = torch.randn(N, C, 1, IW)
6081  input_cpu = base_input.expand_as(input_cuda).requires_grad_()
6082  out_cpu = F.grid_sample(input_cpu, grid_cpu, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6083 
6084  input_cuda = base_input.cuda().expand_as(input_cuda).requires_grad_()
6085  out_cuda = F.grid_sample(input_cuda, grid_cuda, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6086  self.assertEqual(out_cpu, out_cuda)
6087 
6088  # test same size output
6089  test_shape(N, C, H, W, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6090 
6091  # test larger output
6092  N = random.randint(2, 8)
6093  C = random.randint(2, 8)
6094  IH = random.randint(2, 8)
6095  IW = random.randint(2, 8)
6096  H = random.randint(IH + 1, 12)
6097  W = random.randint(IW + 1, 12)
6098  test_shape(N, C, IH, IW, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6099 
6100  # test smaller output
6101  N = random.randint(2, 8)
6102  C = random.randint(2, 8)
6103  IH = random.randint(2, 8)
6104  IW = random.randint(2, 8)
6105  H = random.randint(2, IH)
6106  W = random.randint(2, IW)
6107  test_shape(N, C, IH, IW, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6108 
6109  # test 1x1 inpput
6110  N = random.randint(2, 8)
6111  C = random.randint(2, 8)
6112  IH = 1
6113  IW = 1
6114  H = random.randint(2, 5)
6115  W = random.randint(2, 5)
6116  test_shape(N, C, IH, IW, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6117 
6118  # testing empty grid
6119  N = random.randint(2, 8)
6120  C = random.randint(2, 8)
6121  IH = random.randint(2, 8)
6122  IW = random.randint(2, 8)
6123  W = random.randint(3, IW + 2)
6124  test_shape(N, C, IH, IW, 0, W, mode, padding_mode)
6125 
6126  # testing empty channel
6127  N = random.randint(2, 8)
6128  IH = random.randint(2, 8)
6129  IW = random.randint(2, 8)
6130  H = random.randint(3, IH + 2)
6131  W = random.randint(3, IW + 2)
6132  test_shape(N, 0, IH, IW, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6133 
6134  # testing empty batch
6135  C = random.randint(2, 8)
6136  IH = random.randint(2, 8)
6137  IW = random.randint(2, 8)
6138  H = random.randint(3, IH + 2)
6139  W = random.randint(3, IW + 2)
6140  test_shape(0, C, IH, IW, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6141 
6142  for mode in ('bilinear', 'nearest'):
6143  for padding_mode in ('zeros', 'border', 'reflection'):
6144  # test known input on CPU
6145  input = torch.arange(1., 11).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6146  grid = torch.tensor(
6147  [[[-0.9, -4.1], [0, 0.2000], [1, -1], [-0.333, 1e-10], [0.5, 1.0]],
6148  [[-1.0, -0.5], [0, 0.3333], [1, -1], [-0.200, 1e-10], [1.5, 0.5]]]).view(1, 2, 5, 2)
6149  if mode == 'bilinear':
6150  if padding_mode == 'zeros':
6151  groundtruth = torch.tensor(
6152  [[0.0000, 6.0000000000, 5.0000, 4.8340, 9.0000],
6153  [2.2500, 6.3332500450, 5.0000, 5.1000, 0.0000]]).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6154  elif padding_mode == 'border':
6155  groundtruth = torch.tensor(
6156  [[1.2000, 6.0000000000, 5.0000, 4.8340, 9.0000],
6157  [2.2500, 6.3332500450, 5.0000, 5.1000, 8.7500]]).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6158  elif padding_mode == 'reflection':
6159  groundtruth = torch.tensor(
6160  [[3.4500, 6.0000000000, 5.0000, 4.8340, 9.0000],
6161  [2.2500, 6.3332500450, 5.0000, 5.1000, 7.7500]]).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6162  else:
6163  assert False, "missing groundtruth test for padding mode '{}'".format(padding_mode)
6164  elif mode == 'nearest':
6165  if padding_mode == 'zeros':
6166  groundtruth = torch.tensor(
6167  [[0., 8., 5., 7., 9.],
6168  [1., 8., 5., 8., 0.]]).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6169  elif padding_mode == 'border':
6170  groundtruth = torch.tensor(
6171  [[1., 8., 5., 7., 9.],
6172  [1., 8., 5., 8., 10.]]).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6173  elif padding_mode == 'reflection':
6174  groundtruth = torch.tensor(
6175  [[1., 8., 5., 7., 9.],
6176  [1., 8., 5., 8., 9.]]).view(1, 1, 2, 5)
6177  else:
6178  assert False, "missing groundtruth test for padding mode '{}'".format(padding_mode)
6179  else:
6180  assert False, "missing groundtruth test for interpolation mode '{}'".format(mode)
6181  output = F.grid_sample(input, grid, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6182  self.assertEqual(output, groundtruth,
6183  "groundtruth comparison failed for mode={}, "
6184  "padding_mode={}".format(mode, padding_mode))
6185 
6186  # do gradcheck
6187  N = random.randint(2, 8)
6188  C = random.randint(2, 6)
6189  H = random.randint(2, 8)
6190  W = random.randint(2, 8)
6191  input = torch.randn(N, C, H, W, requires_grad=True)
6192  grid = torch.randn(N, H, W, 2, requires_grad=True)
6193  self.assertTrue(gradcheck(
6194  lambda inp, grid: F.grid_sample(inp, grid, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode),
6195  (input, grid)))
6196 
6197  test(N, C, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6198  if TEST_CUDNN:
6199  with cudnn.flags(enabled=False):
6200  test(N, C, H, W, mode, padding_mode)
6201 
6202  def test_grid_sample_3d(self):
6203  def test(N, C, D, H, W, mode, padding_mode):
6204  def test_shape(N, C, ID, IH, IW, D, H, W, mode, padding_mode):
6205  input_cpu = torch.randn(C, N, ID, IH, IW).transpose(0, 1).requires_grad_()
6206  grid_cpu = torch.randn(D, N, H, W, 3).transpose(0, 1).requires_grad_()
6207  out_cpu = F.grid_sample(input_cpu, grid_cpu, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6208  self.assertTrue(out_cpu.size() == torch.Size([N, C, D, H, W]))
6209 
6210  gradients = torch.randn_like(out_cpu)
6211  out_cpu.backward(gradients)
6212 
6213  if TEST_CUDA:
6214  input_cuda = input_cpu.detach().transpose(0, 1).cuda().transpose(0, 1).requires_grad_()
6215  grid_cuda = grid_cpu.detach().transpose(0, 1).cuda().transpose(0, 1).requires_grad_()
6216  out_cuda = F.grid_sample(input_cuda, grid_cuda, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6217  self.assertEqual(out_cpu, out_cuda)
6218 
6219  out_cuda.backward(gradients.cuda())
6220  self.assertEqual(input_cpu.grad, input_cuda.grad)
6221  self.assertEqual(grid_cpu.grad, grid_cuda.grad, prec=5e-5)
6222 
6223  # check that zero-dimensional input strides don't error out
6224  base_input = torch.randn(N, C, 1, IH, IW)
6225  input_cpu = base_input.expand_as(input_cuda).requires_grad_()
6226  grid_cpu = torch.randn(N, D, H, W, 3, requires_grad=True)
6227  out_cpu = F.grid_sample(input_cpu, grid_cpu, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6228 
6229  input_cuda = base_input.cuda().expand_as(input_cuda).requires_grad_()
6230  grid_cuda = grid_cpu.detach().cuda().requires_grad_()
6231  out_cuda = F.grid_sample(input_cuda, grid_cuda, mode=mode, padding_mode=padding_mode)
6232  self.assertEqual(out_cpu, out_cuda)

6301  # do gradcheck
